org.apache.ctakes.core.cc

Class TokenFreqCasConsumer

  • java.lang.Object
    • CasConsumer_ImplBase
      • org.apache.ctakes.core.cc.TokenFreqCasConsumer

  • public class TokenFreqCasConsumer
extends CasConsumer_ImplBase
    This class creates a file that contains the frequencies of the word tokens found in a set in a text collection. This cas consumer could potentially be used to create a frequency file for any kind of annotation but only counts Token annotations at the moment.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String PARAM_WORD_FREQ_FILE
      The name of the parameter that is specifies the path of the output file in the descriptor file.
      (package private) java.io.File wordFreqFile 
      (package private) java.util.Map<java.lang.String,int[]> wordFreqs 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TokenFreqCasConsumer() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void collectionProcessComplete(ProcessTrace arg0)
      This method sorts the frequency counts and prints out the resulting frequencies in descending order to the frequency file in 'word|count' format.
      void initialize()
      This method opens/creates the file specified by "TokenFreqFile" and initializes the data structure that will keep track of frequency counts.
      void processCas(CAS cas)
      Iterates through all of the WordTokenAnnotation's, gets the covered text for each annotation and increments the frequency count for that text.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • PARAM_WORD_FREQ_FILE

        public static final java.lang.String PARAM_WORD_FREQ_FILE
        The name of the parameter that is specifies the path of the output file in the descriptor file. The value is "TokenFreqFile" and should be set in the descriptor file.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        java.io.File wordFreqFile

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
                throws ResourceInitializationException
        This method opens/creates the file specified by "TokenFreqFile" and initializes the data structure that will keep track of frequency counts.
        Throws:
        ResourceInitializationException
        See Also:
        org.apache.uima.collection.CasConsumer_ImplBase#initialize()

      • processCas

        public void processCas(CAS cas)
                throws ResourceProcessException
        Iterates through all of the WordTokenAnnotation's, gets the covered text for each annotation and increments the frequency count for that text.
        Throws:
        ResourceProcessException
        See Also:
        org.apache.uima.collection.base_cpm.CasObjectProcessor#processCas(org.apache.uima.cas.CAS)

      • collectionProcessComplete

        public void collectionProcessComplete(ProcessTrace arg0)
                               throws ResourceProcessException,
                                      java.io.IOException
        This method sorts the frequency counts and prints out the resulting frequencies in descending order to the frequency file in 'word|count' format.
        Throws:
        ResourceProcessException
        java.io.IOException
